title: My messages
description: View all the messages that OVHcloud has sent you, apart from support requests. You can view support requests in the following section: <anchor>Help</anchor>
iam_display_content_message: You do not have the necessary permissions to view data for this resource. Please contact your administrator.
error_rate_limit_message: You have reached the maximum number of requests. Please try again later.
guided_tour_introduction_title: Welcome to your new My Communications page
guided_tour_introduction_content: Would you like to see the guided tour?
guided_tour_communications: Here you can find all the emails that OVHcloud has sent you, except for support requests.
guided_tour_contacts: Manage your contact list here and add contacts to associate them with your sending settings.
guided_tour_settings: Add and set your sending rules to choose which contacts will receive communications, based on selected categories and priorities.
